comment: /**  * Initialize the root web application context.  */
code: /**  * Initialize the root web application context.  */ @Override public void contextInitialized(ServletContextEvent event) {     initWebApplicationContext(event.getServletContext()). }

comment: /**  * Close the root web application context.  */
code: /**  * Close the root web application context.  */ @Override public void contextDestroyed(ServletContextEvent event) {     closeWebApplicationContext(event.getServletContext()).     ContextCleanupListener.cleanupAttributes(event.getServletContext()). }
